mapper.select: select visitorId, name, password, salt, realName, realNameSecret, nickName, email, emailActivated, mobileNo, registerTime, status, headerLarge, headerSmall, birthday, birthdaySecret, gender, profession, education, introduction, website, city from visitor where visitorId = #{visitorId,jdbcType=CHAR}
